Hi there!

As you may or may not know, I absolutely adore penguins. So, when I heard the african penguin needed help, I had to spring into action â€” especially when I learned that with just under 20 bucks [url:https://adopt.sanccob.co.za/get-involved/adopt-a-penguin/]SANCCOB[/url] can hatch and raise a chick to full health and release them back in the wild.

That's why I'm holding [url:https://www.givengain.com/project/marie-rose-raising-funds-for-sanccob-79329]a fundraiser[/url] during the entirety of SummerCamp, just in time for the breeding season in September. During the entire event, until the award ceremony, you can find me on [url:https://www.twitch.tv/shadowphoenix7899]Twitch[/url] from time to time playing games, doing homework, writing for summer camp, and maybe some music practice too.
